summary: A genetic engineering student tries to revive the skills of a past legend and use them to save India from a deadly virus attack orchestrated by China.
cast: Suriya|Shruti Haasan|Johnny Nguyen|Abhinaya|Ramanathan|Ajaykumar|Ilavarasu|Ashwin Kakumanu|Dhanya Balakrishna|Sujatha Sivakumar|Azhagam Perumal|Misha Ghoshal|A.R. Murugadoss|Steven Dasz|Jill Kelsey|William Donato P. Tabuena|Avinash
keywords: genetic engineering|virus|martial arts|actor playing multiple roles|biological weapon
title: 7 Aum Arivu
